id.description: The unique identifier for the organization

email.description: The contact email address associated with the organization

image.description: URI of the image to be used for this organization

restricted.description: Indicates that the organization is restricted

virtualHost.description: The virtual host associated with the organization

phone.description: Contact phone number of the organization

virtualHost.description: The virtual host associated with the organization

enabled.description: Flag to indicate if this organization is enabled or not

development.description: Flag to indicate if this organization is enabled or not for API development

createdOn.description: Epoch/Unix time stamp when the organization was created

startTrialDate.description: Epoch/Unix time stamp when the trial starts

endTrialDate.description: Epoch/Unix time stamp when the trial expires

trialDuration.description: Length of the trial in days

isTrial.description: Indicates if this Org is a trial or not
